resources.string:
Given IIT Madras’ tryst with entrepreneurship and Indian 
Entrepreneurship’s tryst with destiny, it can be said with 
an air of pride that it would perhaps be an understatement 
to say just that the startups have begun to gain a strong foothold 
at the campus entrepreneurial ground in IIT Madras. Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Madras has come long way 
and is now prepared to embark on a bigger and even more 
fruitful journey. This April, the 13th to 15th, E-Summit 2018 
was back again: IIT Madras’s annual flagship event focussed 
entirely on young entrepreneurship and entrepreneurial venture 
wherein a plethora of activities and interactions promise a 
fun-filled time to the future budding job-givers that one of the 
finest campuses in the world is incubating. Undoubtedly, the one 
of the finest entrepreneurship summits in the country, this report seeks to identify what made E-Summit 2018 so special.
A pool of knowledge where eminent business tycoons, startup experts and CEOs share their experience of life and entrepreneurial journey.
